title: Kemba Walden discusses significance of being first Black woman serving as National Cyber Director
description: NBC’s Julia Ainsley sat down with the new acting National Cyber Director Kemba Walden, who is the first Black woman to hold the position, to discuss one of her personal goals of protecting people of color and other marginalized communities online.

title: Education Department rule would allow some restrictions on trans athletes
description: The Education Department proposed a rule Thursday in connection with the growing number of states that have banned transgender student-athletes from participating on school sports teams that align with their gender identities.

title: Tennessee GOP expels first Democratic lawmaker over gun violence protests
description: Republican lawmakers in Tennessee began expelling three Democratic legislators from the state House over their protests against gun violence.

title: Supreme Court rejects West Virginia bid to enforce sports ban against transgender girl
description: The Supreme Court rejected West Virginia's bid to ban transgender athletes’ participating in girls’ sports.

title: Biden White House largely blames Trump admin for troubled U.S. troop withdrawal from Afghanistan
description: The White House made public on Thursday a report summarizing the 2021 U.S. withdrawal from Afghanistan, including the bombing at the Kabul airport that killed 13 U.S. service members.

title: A Mississippi city reeling from a clean water crisis sees a sudden end to trash collection
description: Residents of Jackson, Mississippi, are scrambling to figure out what to do with their trash after garbage collection abruptly ended amid failed negotiations.

title: House GOP subpoenas former prosecutor in investigation of Trump indictment
description: House Judiciary Committee Chairman Jim Jordan issued a subpoena Thursday to a former NY prosecutor who had led an investigation into Donald Trump's finances.

title: Stormy Daniels says she 'absolutely' would testify against Trump in hush money trial
description: Adult film star Stormy Daniels said she would testify against former President Donald Trump if criminal charges related to hush money allegations reach trial.

title: 478 tornado reports across 25 states: How a mild winter led to destruction
description: The 2023 tornado season’s strong start may be linked to the mild winter it followed, experts say. Tornado activity can be associated with warmer temperatures.

title: Idaho becomes one of the most extreme anti-abortion states with law restricting travel for abortions
description: A new Idaho law makes helping a minor get an abortion, whether through medication or a procedure, in another state punishable by two to five years in prison.

title: Daughters of NBC News’ David Bloom share some of his last words to them 20 years after his death
description: David Bloom’s three daughters were all under 10 years old when they saw him for the last time before his tragic death in 2003, but they can still remember the poignant moment in their family home.

title: Ron DeSantis' long-haul strategy against Trump comes into view
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis’ team is already plotting out a strategy to run against Donald Trump for the long haul.

title: U.S. lawmakers arrive in Taiwan as China blasts McCarthy’s meeting with Tsai
description: A bipartisan congressional delegation arrived in Taiwan on Thursday, a day after House Speaker Kevin McCarthy met with Taiwanese President Tsai Ing-wen.

title: Evidence suggests Russians are stealing art from Ukraine on a World War II scale
description: Growing evidence suggests Russian forces are stealing art and cultural artifacts from Ukraine on a scale not seen in Europe since the Nazi plunder of World War II.

title: Ex-Fox News producer Abby Grossberg has been subpoenaed by Smartmatic in its lawsuit against Fox
description: Former Fox News producer Abby Grossberg has been subpoenaed by Smartmatic in its lawsuit against Fox for how the network reported claims of fraud in the 2020 election.

title: Progressive legislators rally in defense of Tennessee Democrats facing expulsion
description: More than 250 legislators are condemning the proposed expulsion of three Democratic state lawmakers in Tennessee for protesting gun violence on the House floor.

title: U.S. advances portable generator safety rule to prevent carbon monoxide poisoning
description: The Consumer Product Safety Commission is advancing new rules to make portable generators safer, citing a rising number of carbon monoxide poisoning deaths.

title: White House accuses GOP of helping Mexican drug cartels by targeting ATF
description: The White House is opening a new line of attack on Republicans by arguing that threatening firearm-control agencies would help arm Mexican drug cartels.

title: YouTuber allegedly shot while filming prank video in Virginia mall
description: YouTuber Tanner Cook allegedly tried pranking a man at a mall in Virginia for a video causing him to be shot in response, according to Cook’s father. NBC’s Emilie Ikeda has the latest details.
